000.name: The Reflectors
000.essence: Calm, detached, imaginative — avoids pressure by stepping back.

001.name: The Idealists
001.essence: Generous, expressive, or moralistic — projects ideals onto money.
001.tension: Wants to do “good,” but drifts from reality.
001.growthDirection: Ground vision with small, real steps.

010.name: The Organizers
010.essence: Precise, structured, safety-focused — finds comfort in control.

011.name: The Evaluators
011.essence: Orderly and opinionated — defines worth through discipline or correctness.

100.name: The Empaths
100.essence: Warm, receptive, connection-driven — finds identity in giving or belonging.

101.name: The Performers
101.essence: Charismatic, expressive, status-aware — seeks validation through success or lifestyle.

110.name: The Guardians
110.essence: Responsible, protective, loyal — feels safest when providing or managing.

111.name: The Builders
111.essence: Visionary, driven, innovative — sees money as creation energy.
111.tension: Overwork and identity fusion with achievement.
111.growthDirection: Redefine mastery as harmony and meaning.
